name: milsushi2
description: The Fastest Matrix Library for JavaScript http://mil-tokyo.github.io/miljs.html

scripts.typedoc: typedoc . --out ./docs/_site/api/ --target ES5 --module commonjs --mode modules --name Sushi2 --includes apidoc --readme apidoc/index.md
scripts.jekyll: cd docs_raw/jekyll; bundle exec jekyll build --source . --destination ../../docs

author: Masatoshi Hidaka, Ken Miura, Tatsuya Harada
